name: Garu
desc: Wind. Strikes Twice. MT:1 HIT:100 SP:2/Hit

desc: Almighty. Heals user for damage dealt. MT:4 HIT:90 SP:7

desc:

desc: Gun. Calculates damage using user's SKL.

desc: Negates effective bonus of bows and wind magic toward user.

desc: User is immune to critical attacks.

name: Velvet Key
desc: A key given to you by Igor that grants access to the Velvet Room.
